short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new tab when the timer exceeds. Example usage: set the timer before open a social media to limit the time you spent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new tab when the timer exceeds. Set the timer to limit the time you spent in a social media.
